name: The Time Terrorists
description:
As the best detective in the Downtown Kyoto Police Department’s time warping division your job is to stop a duo of criminals from setting off a bomb hidden in a random room at the motel. There are three ways to stop this bomb:

- Knockout both of the terrorists
- Find the code to diffuse the bomb
- Cut the two correct wires on the back of the bomb

This might seem like an impossible task but there is hope. Seeing as you are in the time warping division, every night at midnight you will turn back time to 8AM where you can start the investigation again with all the knowledge that you've gained as well as a shadow of yourself that repeats all of your passed action.

Your clipboard contains hints that you should reveal AS YOU NEED THEM this way you can control the difficulty

Controls

C - open your clipboard

A , D - Move left and right

E - Enter a room / staircase

Q - Hit the enemy

Walk over the bomb which is hidden in a room to open up the bomb interface
